DOC.brief_summary: The intent study see rate body break l-methamphetamine ( l-MA ) could use accurate estimate rate body break d-methamphetamine ( d-MA ) . l-MA sold counter nasal decongestant d-MA commonly abuse form methamphetamine .
DOC.brief_title: Steady State Kinetics l-Methamphetamine Validation Sensitivity Dose Estimation
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects screen St. Luke 's Hospital San Francisco determine eligibility . Once enrolled study take two week . During first week subject attend daily , hour-long outpatient visit San Francisco General Hospital . At visit subject receive oral dose l-methamphetamine , vitals read , answer questionnaire receive blood draw . During second week study subject admit San Francisco General Hospital week long inpatient stay . During stay subject continue receive l-methamphetamine also receive three dos d-methamphetamine three separate day . In addition subject receive blood draw , urine collect , answer questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Males Females Between Ages 18 50 Must experience methamphetamine
